data.title: Prince of Persia: Forgotten Sands Details Emerge
data.meta_description: Here's what we know about the new Prince of Persia game.
data.text:
By now most of you already know that Ubisoft have announced a new Prince of Persia game to coincide with the upcoming movie starring Jake Gyllenhaal as the Persian Prince. Yeah think about that for a second - a Caucasian man playing a Persian Prince.

Anyway thanks to a very informative press release hereâs what we know about the game:

Visiting his brotherâs kingdom following his adventure in Azad, the Prince finds the royal palace under siege from a mighty army bent on its destruction. When the decision is made to use the ancient power of the Sand in a desperate gamble to save the kingdom from total annihilation, the Prince will embark on an epic adventure in which he will learn to bear the mantle of true leadership, and discover that great power often comes with a great cost. Game features include:

Advertisement

Classic Gameplay Reinvented: From huge-scale multi-enemy combat to dizzying feats of acrobatic prowess in gigantic environments enhanced by the Princeâs ability to control nature and time, Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands will push the Princeâs prodigious abilities to unseen levels.

A Blockbuster Experience: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands will offer players unforgettable set pieces made possible by the advanced technology offered by the award-winning Anvil engine. With all-out war at the gates of the kingdom, the Princeâs abilities will be challenged like never before through the course of epic wow moments.

Mastery Over Nature: Wielding powers of nature and time, the Prince will have unparalleled mastery over his environment and his enemies. The Prince will discover that harnessing the forces of nature itself will prove to be a devastating companion to his ability to rewind time.

Return of a Fan-Favorite Franchise: Set between Prince of Persia The Sands of Time and Prince of Persia: Warrior Within, Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands will provide fans a new chapter in the Prince of Persia universe and deepen their understanding of the Sands of Time series.

Advertisement

Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands will release on the Xbox360, PS3, PSP, Wii and DS in May 2010. WTF! No PC Love?
